description: 65+ line conversation where speakers circle back and modify plans multiple times (Monday->Tuesday->Wednesday->Thursday). Final settled event: offsite planning workshop Thursday 10 AM-1 PM.

events.title: Offsite Planning Workshop
events.reasoning: After multiple rounds of rescheduling (Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday all rejected), the team settles on Thursday at 10 AM to 1 PM in the innovation lab. Dave will also be invited.

mock_llm_response.summary: Found 1 event: offsite planning workshop on Thursday from 10 AM to 1 PM. Earlier proposed times were all rejected.

notes: Reference datetime is Friday 2026-02-20, so 'Thursday' is 2026-02-26. The key test is that the model extracts only the FINAL agreed-upon time, not the rejected proposals. Circular planning is a common real-world pattern.
